titleInfo.title: Bobby Helms Show at the Nashville Palace (0705)

mods.abstract: Three color window card (black and red on split fountain, blue to yellow) announcing the Bobby Helms Show with Koko the Clown, Bobby Bridges, Jackie Frazier, Clyde Moody, the Johnny Mathis Show, Carl and Pearl Butler, Roy Weldon, and others at the Nashville Palace on May 22. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/22179.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
